page.title: 19LEISURE TIME IN S. HUTTON
page.content: An active art group meets weekly for painting,drawing and collage.There is a sewing class and a craft group which covers a wide range of subjects.Drama group,choir,bridge,whist,dominos and fishing are all available.Good Companions for the over 55's orgnise some outings and has both snooker and table tennis for more active members.Womens Institute and Gardening club meet monthly,a monthly ramble is also organised between April and October.The playing field has a full sized football pitch and seperate cricket field with pavilion.For children a new play area by the village hall with adventure playground a tarmac area for ball games and a BMX cycle track.Brownies for girls in term time.Sledging on the green in winter is great fun.
